wikipedia_page.main: Colin Raymond Griffin (born 8 January 1956) is an English retired professional football central defender who made over 400 appearances in the Football League for Shrewsbury Town and over 500 in total for the club. Griffin later coached at Gay Meadow and was inducted into the club's Hall of Fame in 2012.

response: Colin Griffin (born 3 August 1982) is an Irish race walker who has competed in the Olympics.
Griffin is a race walker who competed at the 2008 and 2012 Olympic Games in the 50k walk.James Sullivan, "Athlete Q&A – Colin Griffin ", The Running Review, 13 June 2012.
